text: Clifford John Barton (September 3, 1907 in Sault Ste. Marie, Michigan – September 14, 1969) was an American professional ice hockey right winger. Barton played three seasons in the National Hockey League for the Pittsburgh Pirates, Philadelphia Quakers, and New York Rangers. He was the last former Pittsburgh Pirates member to play in the NHL. ==Other websites== * Category:1907 births Category:1969 deaths Category:American Hockey Association (1926–42) players Category:American ice hockey right wingers Category:Hershey Bears players Category:New Haven Eagles players Category:New York Rangers players Category:Philadelphia Quakers (NHL) players Category:Philadelphia Ramblers players Category:Pittsburgh Hornets players Category:Pittsburgh Pirates (NHL) players Category:Sportspeople from Michigan Category:Springfield Indians players Category:Washington Lions players
title: Cliff Barton
